content:
Echoing @Giacomo Tendas' message

Dear all,
On Tuesday the 17th of June, we will meet again for the ItaCa Fest. We will start at 2025-06-17T15:00:00+02:00 .
As usual, you can find all the relevant information (schedule, abstracts, and Zoom link) at the following page:
https://progetto-itaca.github.io/fests/fest25.html
Here is the list of speakers for this episode:
• Urs Schreiber – Geometric Orbifold Cohomology in Singular-Cohesive ∞-Topoi;
• Vova Sosnilo – Homotopy theory of stable categories;
• Francesca Pratale – The root functor.

Best wishes,

Giacomo
